name: One Dog Story (itch)
description:
Deep down under the ground a major catastrophe happened in the science laboratory. Aftermath was terrible. By lucky chance, creature named EO-43 (at least, that was written on his capsule) broke out of chains. This is exactly where our little friend's adventure will start. He is lonely in that underground world, but with your help, he will find out who he is, what his real name is and who is staying behind that terrible catastrophe.

Our OneDogStory kickstarter campaign going well so far! Thank you for your support guys!

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/bwg/one-dog-story-win-mac-linux-onsoles
